metadata.title: CVE-2021-21836 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input using the “ctts” FOURCC code cancause an integer overflow due to unchecked arithmetic resulting in aheap-based buffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker canconvince a user to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
